00019 #ifndef _I8HEXEntry_hpp_cm120321_
00020 #define _I8HEXEntry_hpp_cm120321_
00021 
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <iterator>
00024 #include <numeric>
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00028 #include "logging.hpp"
00029 
00030 namespace Perseus {
00031   class I8HEXEntry {
00032   public:
00033     typedef enum Type {
00034       DataRecord      = 0,
00035       EndOfFileRecord = 1
00036     } Type;
00037     typedef std::vector<boost::uint8_t> code_vector;
00038 
00039     I8HEXEntry(std::string line) {
00040       ASSERT_THROW(line[0] == ':');
00041       ASSERT_THROW(line.size() > 9);
00042       _addr = hex2int(std::string(line,3,4));
00043       const boost::uint8_t type(hex2int(std::string(line,7,2)));
00044       ASSERT_THROW(type == DataRecord || type == EndOfFileRecord);
00045       if (type == DataRecord)      _type = DataRecord;
00046       if (type == EndOfFileRecord) _type = EndOfFileRecord;
00047       const size_t length(hex2int(std::string(line,1,2)));
00048       for (size_t i=0; i<length; ++i)
00049         _code.push_back(hex2int(std::string(line,9+2*i,2)));
00050       ASSERT_THROW(hex2int(std::string(line,9+2*length,2)) == checksum());
00051     }
00052     std::string to_str() const {
00053       std::string line(str(boost::format(":%02X%04X%02X") 
00054                            % _code.size()
00055                            % int(_addr)
00056                            % _type));
00057       BOOST_FOREACH(boost::uint8_t c, _code)
00058         line += str(boost::format("%02X") % int(c));
00059       return line + str(boost::format("%02X") % int(checksum()));
00060     }
00061 
00062     Type get_type() const { return _type; }
00063     boost::uint16_t get_addr() const { return _addr; }
00064     const code_vector& get_code() const { return _code; }
00065   protected:
00066   private:
00067     boost::uint8_t checksum() const { // = 2-compement of sum of all bytes
00068       return 1 + (0xFF ^ (_code.size()
00069                           + _type
00070                           + (_addr&0xFF)
00071                           + (_addr>>8)
00072                           + std::accumulate(_code.begin(), _code.end(), 0)));
00073     }
00074     static unsigned int hex2int(const std::string s) {
00075       unsigned result(0);
00076       std::stringstream iss; iss << std::hex << s; iss >> result;
00077       return result;
00078     }
00079     boost::uint16_t _addr;
00080     Type            _type;
00081     code_vector     _code;
00082   } ;
00083 } // namespace Perseus
00084 #endif // _I8HEXEntry_hpp_cm120321_
